# grunt-contrib-uglify v0.4.1 [![Build Status: Linux](https://travis-ci.org/gruntjs/grunt-contrib-uglify.png?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/gruntjs/grunt-contrib-uglify)

> Minify files with UglifyJS.



## Getting Started
This plugin requires Grunt `~0.4.0`

If you haven't used [Grunt](http://gruntjs.com/) before, be sure to check out the [Getting Started](http://gruntjs.com/getting-started) guide, as it explains how to create a [Gruntfile](http://gruntjs.com/sample-gruntfile) as well as install and
